casebody.data:
No. 10-219. Pike County Joint Vocational School District, et al., Petitioners v. Misty Knisley, et al. 562 U.S. 962, 131 S. Ct. 498,

178 L. Ed. 2d 290,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8085. October 12, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 604 F.3d 977.
